title: Iced Finger Buns
ingredients: ['For the Finger Buns', '500g plain flour', '35g dried skimmed milk powder', '1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '125g caster sugar', '50g golden raisins', '1 pinch salt', '50g butter, melted and cooled', '1 egg, lightly beaten', 'For the Icing', '150g sifted icing sugar', '25g unsalted butter, melted', '2-3 teaspoons water or as needed']
